mapper.select: select h.ID,h.USERID,h.TYPEID,h.STREETID,h.TITLE,h.DESCRIPTION,h.PRICE,h.PUBDATE,h.ADDDATE,h.FLOORAGE,h.CONTACT, u.ID uid,u.USERNAME,u.PASSWORD,u.REALNAME,u.ISADMIN, st.ID stid,st.NAME stname, d.ID did,d.NAME dname, t.NAME typename FROM t_house h INNER JOIN t_user u,t_type t,t_street st,t_district d WHERE h.USERID = u.ID AND h.TYPEID = t.ID AND h.STREETID = st.ID AND st.DISTRICTID = d.ID

select h.ID,h.USERID,h.TYPEID,h.STREETID,h.TITLE,h.DESCRIPTION,h.PRICE,h.PUBDATE,h.ADDDATE,h.FLOORAGE,h.CONTACT, u.ID uid,u.USERNAME,u.PASSWORD,u.REALNAME,u.ISADMIN, st.ID stid,st.NAME stname, d.ID did,d.NAME dname, t.NAME typename FROM t_house h INNER JOIN t_user u,t_type t,t_street st,t_district d WHERE h.USERID = u.ID AND h.TYPEID = t.ID AND h.STREETID = st.ID AND st.DISTRICTID = d.ID AND h.ID = #{id}

select h.ID,h.USERID,h.TYPEID,h.STREETID,h.TITLE,h.DESCRIPTION,h.PRICE,h.PUBDATE,h.ADDDATE,h.FLOORAGE,h.CONTACT, u.ID uid,u.USERNAME,u.PASSWORD,u.REALNAME,u.ISADMIN, st.ID stid,st.NAME stname, d.ID did,d.NAME dname, t.NAME typename
FROM t_house h INNER JOIN t_user u ON h.USERID = u.ID INNER JOIN t_type t ON h.TYPEID = t.ID INNER JOIN t_street st ON h.STREETID = st.ID INNER JOIN t_district d on st.DISTRICTID = d.ID
and h.typeid = #{typeId}
and h.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and h.price >= 0 and h.price < 1000
and h.price >= 1000 and h.price < 2000
and h.price >= 2000
and h.floorage >= 0 and h.floorage < 60
and h.floorage >= 60 and h.floorage < 100
and h.floorage >= 100 and h.floorage < 150
and h.floorage >= 150
and d.id = #{districtId}
and st.id = #{streetId}
limit #{firstResult},#{maxResult}

SELECT count(h.id) FROM t_house h INNER JOIN t_type t ON h.typeid = t.id INNER JOIN t_user u ON h.userid = u.id INNER JOIN t_street s ON h.streetid = s.id INNER JOIN t_district d ON s.districtid = d.id
and h.typeid = #{typeId}
and h.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and h.price >= 0 and h.price < 1000
and h.price >= 1000 and h.price < 2000
and h.price >= 2000
and h.floorage >= 0 and h.floorage < 60
and h.floorage >= 60 and h.floorage < 100
and h.floorage >= 100 and h.floorage < 150
and h.floorage >= 150
and d.id = #{districtId}
and s.id = #{streetId}
select count(id) from t_house where `typeid`=#{typeid} and `streetid`=#{streetid} and `floorage`=#{floorage}
